nodes.text: Bakari was a Jedi who lived during the High Republic Era. Normally stationed at the Bromlarch outpost, Bakari travelled to Valo to attend the Republic Fair being held there, which was attacked by the Nihil. Communications were down during the early part of the battle, but after Padawan Ram Jomaram restored communications, Jedi Master Stellan Gios called on the Jedi and Galactic Republic forces to report, and Bakari was among those who checked in.
